Title: Events
Description: Weddings, reunions, fairs or community festivities. For all types of events, we can capture high resolution photos and video, while ensuring that we provide complete legal compliance.

Sections.Title: Weddings and Reunions
Sections.BodyHtml: From unobtrusive pictures and video, to up-close and personal records of the happy day, we have you covered.

Sections.Title: Community Events
Sections.BodyHtml: Rodeos, markets, car shows, etc. After obtaining the appropriate clearances from Transport Canada and NavCan, we will help get the videos and photos that help make your event memorable.

Sections.Title: Non-advertised Events
Sections.BodyHtml: Record of get-togethers, sporting events and other important happenings from perspectives that the average person never sees.

Title: Inspection Services
Description: Safe, cost-effective inspections for infrastructure, powerlines, property damage and more.

Sections.Title: Roof Damage Assessment
Sections.BodyHtml: High-resolution orthomosaics and oblique imagery to identify hail, wind, and water damage. Deliverables include geotagged photos and a summary report.

Sections.Title: Powerline & Utility Inspection
Sections.BodyHtml: Thermal and RGB capture to spot hotspots, insulator defects, and vegetation encroachment. Secure online delivery and annotated issue tracking included.

Sections.Title: Bridge & Structure Survey
Sections.BodyHtml: Close-proximity flights with collision sensing to document cracking, spalling, and corrosion. 3D reconstructions available for progress comparisons.
